actor_awards.notes: Renowned for her versatility and intelligence, she received an Academy Award nomination for her portrayal of an alcoholic in 'Days of Wine and Roses'. She won Golden Globes for her television work in 'The Blue Knight' and 'Jennie: Lady Randolph Churchill'.

filmography.title: Days of Wine and Roses
filmography.role_description: A young woman who is pulled into alcoholism by her husband, eventually succumbing to the addiction more deeply than he does.
filmography.plot: An alcoholic man falls in love with and marries a young woman, whom he systematically addicts to booze so they can share his 'passion' together.

filmography.title: Anatomy of a Murder
filmography.role_description: The flirtatious and enigmatic wife of a lieutenant accused of murder, whose behavior complicates the defense.
filmography.plot: A small-town lawyer defends an army lieutenant stationed in Michigan who is accused of killing a bartender he claims raped his wife.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Nomination – Best Actress in a Motion Picture - Drama

filmography.title: The Omen
filmography.role_description: The mother of the Antichrist who begins to suspect that her adopted son is evil.
filmography.plot: Mysterious deaths surround an American ambassador. Could the child that he is raising actually be the Antichrist? The devil's own son?

filmography.title: A Face in the Crowd
filmography.role_description: A teenage baton twirler who catches the eye of a rising media demagogue. Remick's film debut.
filmography.plot: An Arkansas drifter becomes an overnight media sensation. As he becomes intoxicated with fame and power, his darker side begins to emerge.

filmography.title: Wild River
filmography.role_description: A young widow in 1930s Tennessee who falls in love with the TVA official sent to evict her grandmother.
filmography.plot: A TVA bureaucrat comes to a river to oversee the construction of a dam, and he encounters opposition from the local people, in particular a woman who refuses to leave her home.

filmography.title: The Long, Hot Summer
filmography.role_description: The spirited daughter-in-law of a powerful Mississippi patriarch.
filmography.plot: A conman arrives in a Mississippi town and ingratiates himself with a wealthy family, raising the ire of the son and the interest of the daughter.

filmography.title: Experiment in Terror
filmography.role_description: A bank teller terrorized by an asthmatic killer who forces her to steal money.
filmography.plot: A bank teller is terrorized by a man who forces her to steal from her bank to save her sister's life.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Nomination – Best Actress in a Motion Picture - Drama

filmography.title: The Detective
filmography.role_description: The nymphomaniac wife of a tough police detective, played by Frank Sinatra.
filmography.plot: A police detective investigates the murder of a homosexual man, leading to a complex web of corruption and secrets.

filmography.title: The Europeans
filmography.role_description: A sophisticated European baroness who visits her puritanical cousins in 19th-century New England.
filmography.plot: A Countess and her brother from Europe visit their cousins in mid-19th century New England, clashing with their strict ways.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Nomination – Best Actress in a Motion Picture - Drama

filmography.title: Jennie: Lady Randolph Churchill
filmography.role_description: The American heiress who became the mother of Winston Churchill. (TV Miniseries)
filmography.plot: A biographical drama about the life of Jennie Jerome, the American beauty who married Lord Randolph Churchill.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Win – Best Actress in a Television Series - Drama; BAFTA: Win – Best Actress

filmography.title: No Way to Treat a Lady
filmography.role_description: A woman who becomes involved with a detective hunting a serial killer.
filmography.plot: A detective hunts a serial killer who uses various disguises and calls him to taunt him about his crimes.

filmography.title: The Blue Knight
filmography.role_description: The girlfriend of an aging beat cop in this acclaimed TV movie/miniseries.
filmography.plot: An aging Los Angeles police officer searches for the killer of a prostitute while dealing with the stress of his job.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Win – Best Actress in a Television Series - Drama

filmography.title: Sometimes a Great Notion
filmography.role_description: The wife of a union-busting logger who struggles to fit into his rugged family.
filmography.plot: A family of fiercely independent Oregon loggers struggle to keep the family business alive amidst changing times.

filmography.title: The Hallelujah Trail
filmography.role_description: A temperance leader attempting to stop a shipment of whiskey to Denver.
filmography.plot: A wagon train heading for Denver with a cargo of whiskey is targeted by temperance campaigners, the US Cavalry, and local Indians.

filmography.title: Telefon
filmography.role_description: A KGB agent who partners with Charles Bronson to stop sleeper agents from being activated.
filmography.plot: A Russian KGB agent is sent to the United States to stop a rogue agent from activating brainwashed saboteurs.

filmography.title: The Running Man
filmography.role_description: The wife of a man who fakes his own death for insurance money.
filmography.plot: A man fakes his own death to cheat an insurance company, but his plan is complicated when an insurance investigator trails him to Spain.

filmography.title: A Delicate Balance
filmography.role_description: The daughter returning home after her fourth failed marriage in this Edward Albee adaptation.
filmography.plot: An upper-class couple's empty nest is filled by the return of their daughter and the arrival of terrified friends.

filmography.title: The Competition
filmography.role_description: A piano teacher and mentor to one of the competitors.
filmography.plot: Two pianists engage in a romance while competing against each other in a prestigious music competition.
filmography.awards: Golden Raspberry Award: Nomination – Worst Supporting Actress (Note: Controversial nomination)

filmography.title: Tribute
filmography.role_description: The ex-wife of a dying Broadway press agent who tries to reconnect with his son.
filmography.plot: A Broadway press agent learns he has a terminal illness and tries to patch things up with his estranged son.

filmography.title: The Medusa Touch
filmography.role_description: A psychiatrist who treated a man with the telekinetic power to cause disasters.
filmography.plot: A French detective discovers that the victim of an attempted murder has the power to cause disasters just by thinking about them.

filmography.title: The Wheeler Dealers
filmography.role_description: A female stockbroker trying to make it in a male-dominated field.
filmography.plot: A Texas oil millionaire heads to New York to have some fun playing the stock market and falls for a female broker.

filmography.title: Baby the Rain Must Fall
filmography.role_description: The wife of a violent, parolee rockabilly singer (Steve McQueen).
filmography.plot: A woman and her young daughter travel to a small Texas town to reunite with her husband, who has just been released from prison.

filmography.title: Hard Contract
filmography.role_description: A socialite who falls in love with a professional hitman.
filmography.plot: A hitman hired to kill three people in Europe falls in love with a woman who makes him question his profession.

filmography.title: Sanctuary
filmography.role_description: A Southern woman haunted by her past in this adaptation of William Faulkner's novels.
filmography.plot: In the 1920s South, a woman's dark past resurfaces when her servant is accused of murdering her child.

filmography.title: Nutcracker: Money, Madness & Murder
filmography.role_description: A manipulative socialite who convinces her son to murder her father for inheritance money. (TV Miniseries)
filmography.plot: The true story of a wealthy woman who manipulates her son into killing her father.
filmography.awards: Primetime Emmy: Nomination – Outstanding Lead Actress in a Miniseries or a Special

filmography.title: Loot
filmography.role_description: A black widow nurse who has murdered several husbands and sets her sights on a new widower.
filmography.plot: Two bank robbers hide their loot in a coffin, but complications ensue involving a corrupt inspector and a murderous nurse.

filmography.title: Hennessy
filmography.role_description: The widow of an IRA sympathizer who becomes involved with a man planning to blow up Parliament.
filmography.plot: An Irishman whose family is killed during a riot in Belfast plans to assassinate the Queen of England in revenge.
